mapper.select: select ,(select a.description from CMS_V_PUBLISH_CONTENT a where a.id=t.project_Source_id ) as resourceDescription from CMS_PROJECT t where t.project_Source_id=#{id}
select ,(select a.description from CMS_V_PUBLISH_CONTENT a where a.id=t.project_Source_id ) as resourceDescription from CMS_PROJECT t where t.id=#{id}

select from CMS_CONTACTS_PROJECT t where t.company_id in (select a.id from CMS_COMPANY a where a.company_name=#{companyName})
and t.project_post REGEXP #{personRole}

select left(substring_index(substring_index(t.Industry1_id,',',c.help_topic_id+2),',',-1),4) industry1,count(t.id) countInfo from CMS_PROJECT t join mysql.help_topic c on c.help_topic_id <(length(t.Industry1_id) - length(replace(t.Industry1_id,',',''))-1) group by industry1 ORDER BY countInfo desc

select substring_index(substring_index(t.Industry1_id,',',c.help_topic_id+2),',',-1) industry1,count(t.id) countInfo from CMS_PROJECT t join mysql.help_topic c on c.help_topic_id <(length(t.Industry1_id) - length(replace(t.Industry1_id,',',''))-1)
and t.Industry1_id like CONCAT("%,",#{industryId},"%") and t.Industry1_id not like CONCAT("%,",#{industryId},",%")
group by industry1 ORDER BY countInfo desc

select left(substring_index(substring_index(t.area_tail_id,',',c.help_topic_id+2),',',-1),6) area,count(t.id) countInfo from CMS_PROJECT t join mysql.help_topic c on c.help_topic_id <(length(t.area_tail_id) - length(replace(t.area_tail_id,',',''))-1) group by area ORDER BY countInfo desc

select substring_index(substring_index(t.area_tail_id,',',c.help_topic_id+2),',',-1) area,count(t.id) countInfo from CMS_PROJECT t join mysql.help_topic c on c.help_topic_id <(length(t.area_tail_id) - length(replace(t.area_tail_id,',',''))-1) group by area ORDER BY countInfo desc

select a.COMPANY_TYPE,count(t.id) countinfo from CMS_PROJECT t,CMS_COMPANY_PROJECT a
and t.Industry1_id like CONCAT("%,",#{industryId},"%") and t.Industry1_id not like CONCAT("%,",#{industryId},",%")
and t.ID=a.PROJECT_ID and a.COMPANY_TYPE is not null
GROUP BY a.COMPANY_TYPE order by countinfo
select ,(select a.description from CMS_V_PUBLISH_CONTENT a where a.id=t.project_Source_id ) as resourceDescription from CMS_PROJECT t
select id,company_Name,company_Alias,address,zipcode,phone,fax from CMS_COMPANY t where t.company_Name = #{name} limit 0,1
select contacts_name name,sex,phone,cellphone,fax,email,address,zipcode,company_name companyName from CMS_CONTACTS t WHERE t.id = #{id}
select id,company_Name,company_Alias,address,zipcode,phone,fax from CMS_COMPANY t where t.id = #{id}
select a.COMPANY_NAME name from CMS_COMPANY a where a.COMPANY_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') LIMIT 0,5
select t.COMPANY_TYPE as role from CMS_COMPANY_PROJECT t where t.COMPANY_NAME=#{name} GROUP BY t.COMPANY_TYPE
select t.PROJECT_POST as role from CMS_CONTACTS_PROJECT t where t.COMPANY_ID in (select a.id from CMS_COMPANY a where a.company_name=#{name}) GROUP BY t.PROJECT_POST

select a.project_name projectName from CMS_PROJECT a ,(SELECT t.PROJECT_ID,COUNT(1) cc from CMS_COMPANY_PROJECT t,CMS_PROJECT b where b.CONFIRM_DATE>#{startDate} and t.PROJECT_ID=b.ID and b.INDUSTRY1_ID like concat('%',#{industryId},'%') ORDER BY cc desc limit 0,1) b where a.ID=b.PROJECT_ID
